price: 16. (Iblis) dijo: «Por haber causado mi ruina, acecharé (a los hombres) en Tu camino recto (para desviarlos).
arabic: قَالَ فَبِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأَقۡعُدَنَّ لَهُمۡ صِرَٰطَكَ ٱلۡمُسۡتَقِيمَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla fabimā aghwaytanī la-aqʿudanna lahum ṣirāṭaka al-mus'taqīma
